articles.title: Benzema, Mane among 10 injured stars ruled out of World Cup - ESPN India
articles.description: Injury issues have seen the World Cup robbed of some top stars ahead of the tournament. There are some big names missing, but who are they?
articles.content:
The 2022 World Cup in Qatar is a tournament like no other in that it starts just a week after the domestic season was put on pause.
